backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling authorization, blob storage, user profiles, and full recipe CRUD with likes and comments.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old recipe records to the new schema by adding photo, likes, and comments fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and tests with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for documentation or planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and color tokens defining light and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML page bootstrapping the frontend and loading the main React entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Router and theme setup defining all major application routes including home, browse, detail, edit, and monetize pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer showing copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai with tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the site header with navigation, brand logo, auth-aware links, and monetization/new-recipe buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the page with header, footer, and main content layout.
frontend/src/components/monetize/AuthorM: Displays support links and products for an author if available.
frontend/src/components/monetize/Product: Manages adding, editing, and deleting monetized products, saving them to the storefront.
frontend/src/components/monetize/Support: Allows users to create, edit, and remove external support links tied to their storefront.
frontend/src/components/recipes/RecipeCa: Shows a clickable recipe summary with image, metadata, and navigation to details.
frontend/src/components/recipes/RecipeFo: Form for creating or editing recipes, including photo upload, ingredients, and steps.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes login, clear, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching recipes and user profiles through an actor, with conditional fetching based on authentication and actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecipeMutations.ts: Implements recipe-related mutations such as create, update, delete, like, and unlike, with query invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useStorefrontMutation: Provides mutations for saving and deleting a user’s storefront, including cache invalidation and error handling with toasts.
Contains hooks to fetch storefront, product, and support link data for the caller or other users using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and color variables, defining a warm theme and dark mode plus recipe hero component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing recent recipes, hero section, and conditional UI for authenticated users, including profile setup prompting.
frontend/src/pages/MonetizePage.tsx: Displays monetization settings, prompting login if needed and showing support link and product editors when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/RecipeDetailPage.tsx: Shows a full recipe with likes, comments, edit/delete for owners, and author monetization info.
frontend/src/pages/RecipeEditorPage.tsx: Provides create/edit recipe functionality with photo upload, authentication checks, and navigation handling.
frontend/src/pages/RecipesBrowsePage.tsx: Lists all recipes with loading states and optional profile-setup prompt for new authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for getting, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing features, known issues, and architectural notes for a recipe‑sharing web app. Captures authentication, recipe management, theming, asset generation, and monetization features.
